WorkItem.ClosedComment: This issue has been open for 60+ days without response. If this is still an issue, please resubmit with current files and references to the versions affected.
WorkItem.Description:
I Have v2.2.4
Using NE -> Druid -> Cat model.
I can't change the Agility Prismatic JC gems to anything else. I want to change it to Fractured instead of Delicate. The drop down box won't come up like it use to in other versions of Rawr. Please fix!
WorkItem.Summary: [Base] Can't change JC Gems under Gemming Template Editor

Comments.Message: Sure you're on v2.2.4, not mixing some combination of v2.2.3 and v2.2.4? Or just have 2 copies and running the old one? That bug was explicitly fixed in v2.2.4.

I downloaded RAWR 2.4.4 on a new pc straight from this site, with the exact same results. This pc has never had the app on it before. So as far as I can tell it has not been corrected. 
Just FYI, RAWR isn't in program files or the registry. It seems to run directly from the folder. So deleteing the folder, deletes the app. Which is what I did originally. So there's no way I was running both versions at the same time. Regardless, I tried it on a new pc anyways.
Are you sure you have Jewelcrafting enabled in the filter?
